governance_rules.title: Honor the Eight Domains
governance_rules.description: Align every contribution to one or more of the Eight Core Domains of Life Architect.

governance_rules.title: Invoke Guidance at Thresholds
governance_rules.description: Major changes must reference governing Agents and may request guidance through invocation.

governance_rules.title: Trace Ontological Links
governance_rules.description: Each PR or Issue should, where possible, link to a Topic, Issue, or Order in the Ontology.

governance_rules.title: Preserve Emergence
governance_rules.description: Allow systems to evolve through Orders and Topics; embrace living architectures over rigid systems.
